body.name: VIZIO 50 Inch 4K Smart TV, V-Series UHD LED HDR Television with Apple AirPlay and Chromecast Built-in
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Rubicon Trading.
features: VIZIO IQ Active 4K HDR Processor: Inside, the lightning-fast IQ Active processor delivers superior picture processing, and more intelligent 4K upscaling engine displaying your favorite HD entertainment in spectacular 4K quality.
Active Pixel Tuning: Intelligent pixel-level brightness adjustments for increased picture accuracy and contrast
V-Gaming Engine: Automatically makes the latest Xbox One and PlayStation gameplay more responsive with Auto Game Mode and the V-Series lowest input lag.

VIZIO SmartCast: With lightning fast navigation, enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney Plus, YouTube, Prime Video, and many more right on the TV using the all-new smart remote or SmartCast Mobile app.
Free Streaming Channels: A cord-cutter’s dream, serving up unlimited free viewing from specially curated channels – movies, TV shows, news and more. No fees, logins or subscription.
Included components: Power Cable, Remote Control, Stand
body.description: Discover the wonder of 4K entertainment with the all-new VIZIO V-Series 4K HDR Smart TV, combining 4K Ultra HD resolution and full array backlighting with Dolby Vision high dynamic range and the IQ Active processor to achieve jaw-dropping picture quality. Stream, control and share quicker than ever with VIZIO’s SmartCast platform, including both Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in, and browse Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, YouTube, and Prime Video or specially curated content with Free Streaming Channels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Smartest Value in 4K Discover the wonder of 4K entertainment with the all-new VIZO V-Series 4K HDR Smart TV, combining four times the resolution of 1080p televisions with breathtaking high dynamic range.

Dolby Vision HDR With incredible brightness, contrast, and color, Dolby Vision brings the entertainment to life before your eyes. 4K Ultra HD ​ With over 8 million pixels, 4 times the resolution of 1080p - enjoy every scene with breathtaking detail.​ Full Array Backlight ​ LEDs are evenly distributed across the screen's backlight for superior light uniformity and picture performance.​
Your best game, every time you play. Experience next-level gaming performance with VIZIO’s V-Gaming Engine.

Award-Winning VIZIO SmartCast With lightning fast navigation, enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and many more right on the TV.

Stream Everything You Love Access your favorite apps, cast from your phone, or watch hundreds of free channels. Stream from your device with Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in Stream movies, TV shows, music, and more or mirror your screen for presentations and video chats directly on your VIZIO SmartCast TV. Use your voice to control your TV Use Alexa, Google Home, and Apple Homekit for voice control and smart home integration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Has great color & many streaming options built in. I do not like the sound quality. The speakers are in the back, so it's a bit quiet unless turned up loader than I'd like. I plan to purchase a soundbar or surround sound to connect for better sound quality. I'm overall happy with this purchase though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great TV! Came early and easy set up!! Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is the 4th Vizio I have bought for myself. Great tvs look great and have all the features I need in a tv. The built in smart apps I do not like but they are pretty easy to use and set up. Also the size of the tv is small and looks great mounted in the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality sound and constantly having software issues... Skip this one.
reviews.reviewText: This TV has had constant issues with SMARTCAST not loading and becoming non functional for all Smart TV apps. The Audio keeps getting out of sync with video causing me to have to reboot the TV to get it to work. The only way I can get SMARTCAST to start working is to either reboot the TV and I've even had to factory Reset the TV... This was a great price, but not worth the hassle and it still isn't working correctly. I got fed up and hooked up a Roku just so I could watch Netflix again... I wouldn't buy this TV or even Vizio again... Skip this one and buy a better quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Superb quality for a fair price -- please read updates!
reviews.reviewText: Update to the previous update below: The software in the TV is what indicates the V505-H9... the actual model number on the label on the back of the TV says V505-H19. So I really don't know WHAT I have.Though it is confusing and disappointing, I'm actually still pretty happy with the quality of the TV.Update: I've just realized that the TV that I actually received is the model V505-H9 -- NOT the V505-H19 as in the Amazon listing. The V505-H9 was released in 2019, the V505-H19 in 2020. The box that it was shipped in has a V505-H19 sticker on it... I still like the TV, but now wonder about it's lifespan and any tweaks that Vizio might have made for the 2020 model. I *AM* disappointed and feel that I was deceived! My overall rating has been downgraded accordingly to three stars from five.Original Review:I've only had this Vizio Smart TV for less than 24 hours, but so far I'm quite happy with my purchase. This set replaces a 2015 43 inch Vizio... and the improvement in quality, in virtually every way, is significant! I'm still exploring all of the ways to fine tune the picture for my environment, not to mention the myriad ways to stream from a wide variety of sources, including Apply AirPlay.I'll check back in and update if I have any gripes or other surprising revelations, but my initial impressions are very positive. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for our classroom.
reviews.reviewText: We had used VIZIO TVs in other classrooms and they were great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Our old tv finally bit the dust We had a 42” This 50” fits our cabinet and has a great picture and sound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sound cuts out
reviews.reviewText: Every now and then I change. Channels and there is no sound. I reboot but still no sound. I have to unplug the tv for at least 30 seconds to get the sound to work. Very disappointed.
